meta.description: Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same

content.introduction:
Disallow assignments where both sides are exactly the same

Table of ContentsRule DetailsOptionspropsWhen Not To Use ItVersionResources
Self assignments have no effect, so probably those are an error due to incomplete refactoring.
Those indicate that what you should do is still remaining.
foo=foo;[bar,baz]=[bar,qiz];12Copy code to clipboard
content.sub_configuration_introduction:
This rule has the option to check properties as well.
props- if this istrue,no-self-assignrule warns self-assignments of properties. Default istrue.
